title: A discourse vpon the earthquake that hapned throughe this realme of Englande, and other places of Christendom, the first of Aprill. 1580. betwene the houres of fiue and six in the euening. Written by Arthur Golding, gentleman
author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by Henry Binneman dwelling in Thamis streate nere Baynerds castle,
